meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mucous.
meanings.sent1: The mucosities of the slime made it hard to clean.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the mucosities in a simple way.
meanings.sent3: The mucosities of the glue made it stick to everything!
meanings.sent4: The mucosities of the pond water clung to the ducks' feathers.
meanings.sent5: The mucosities of the jellyfish tentacles were dangerous to touch.

meanings.sent1: She avoided touching the mucosities on the tree bark.
meanings.sent2: The chef used the mucosities to thicken the soup.
meanings.sent3: The mucosities on the banana peel made it slippery.
meanings.sent4: The mucosities on the snail's trail glistened in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The mucosities on the slug's skin helped it move smoothly.
